DbDetails.queryFormat: update hr_employee_termination set status=1491 where hr_employee_termination_id='%{hr_employee_termination_vLst[hr_employee_termination_id]}' and status is null

DbDetails.DbTable: xbs.hr_employee_termination het JOIN hr_employee_v he ON het.employee_id=he.hr_employee_id LEFT JOIN xbs.sys_pd_header pd ON pd.primary_document='hr_employee_termination' AND het.hr_employee_termination_id=pd.primary_document_id AND pd.status!=325
DbDetails.Where: hr_employee_termination_id='%{hr_employee_termination_vLst[hr_employee_termination_id]}' and het.status=1491 AND sys_pd_header_id IS null

pd.sys_pd_header_id in (select sys_pd_header_id from sys_pd_header where primary_document='hr_employee_termination' and primary_document_id='%{hr_employee_termination_vLst[hr_employee_termination_id]}')
